name: Wizma
description:
Welcome to the Wizma Page!

Wizma is an exciting game with magic powers! You can throw magic powers at enemies! Don't be afraid of enemies! You're not alone. You can play this game with your friend on just one PC!  

The game comes with a help page that you can use before starting.

Magics:

- Health Magic: With this magic, your friend and your health can be improved.

- Fire Magic: This magic allows you to throw fire.

- Ice Magic: By using this magic, you can create ice pieces from the ground.

- Lightning Magic: With this magic, you can strike your enemies with lightning sparks.

Features:

- WebGL and Windows output

- Play with friends

- Help Page

- Settings page for graphics and sounds
